definitions.definition: an obvious difference between two or more things:
examples: I like the contrast of the white trousers with the black jacket.

definitions.definition: to compare two people or things in order to show the differences between them:
examples: If you contrast some of her early writing with her later work, you can see just how much she improved.

definitions.definition: If one thing contrasts with another, it is very different from it:
examples: The styles of the two film makers contrast quite dramatically.
